Finance and research professional passionate about applying data analytics and machine learning to Business, Economics and Finance. Currently, I teach finance and accounting at [Karatina University](https://karu.ac.ke/)\

I enjoy coding, teaching, research and data analytics.\
\
Proficient in Ms Excel, R, Python, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Teradata, SQL Server, Git and GitHub, and Tableau.

Working knowledge of Bash, Docker, Stata and E-views.

I hold a PhD in Financial Economics from University of the Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, South Africa. Besides, I am a Certified Accountant (CPA) and a Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA).

In my free time I swim, travel, watch documentaries and listen to music.
